author: dildick
body:
This pull request is an intermediate step towards fully updating the GEM-CSC local triggers for Phase2. It fixes the most pressing issues in the ME11 and ME21 motherboards, namely the construction of the ALCT-GEM type LCTs. The code is far from cleaned up yet. I plan to do that in a final pull request in this series. 

@tahuang1991
title: Updates to GEM-CSC integrated local trigger for Phase2
